# CLAUDE.md

This file provides guidance to Claude Code (claude.ai/code) when working with code in this repository.

## Autogenerated repo

   This repo is auto-generated from the content in the site repo. Give a warning if any changes to the 
   files in this repo are requested.


## Git commit messages
   **Format of the Message**
   Structure the message like this:
   ```
   Primary change description under 120 characters

   - First detailed change in one line
   - Second detailed change in one line
   - Third detailed change in one line
   - Additional changes as needed

   Authored-By: Brian Hurley
   ```
